nodes.text: Osaji Uhares was a member of the Osaji family, who worked for the family business, the Osaji Syndicate. He lived on Centares, had a cybernetic hand and collected old droids. He refitted twelve B1-Series battle droids and a Droideka to serve as his personal bodyguards. He was killed during the Galactic Civil War by a group of spacers hired by Uhares's sister, Osaji Hux.
